name: places/ChIJN8C33kVZwokRFblco_jmrZ0
formattedAddress: 407 Broome St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 407 Broome St, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text:
This is about the company and not the product.  I asked, in an email which is their only form of contacting them, if the company can possibly taper down some of their commercials on the Roku.

Their commercials are absolutely gross, the acting is terrible, and it looks very outdated by about five decades.

Of course, they did not get back with me and ghosted me,  When a commercial makes you cringe and is tormenting the customer, it would be nice to consider the possible consumers opinion.

About the product research, Hyaluronic acid for pimples has been around for a long time.  I think all they have going for the product is the zit cover-up.

originalText.text: Fantastic products. I've been using the exfoliating cleanser and the moisturizer for a week and my skin is looking and feeling phenomenal. The lack of strong scent is fantastic for all types of sensitive skin, and the packaging is beautiful!

text.text: Fantastic products. I've been using the exfoliating cleanser and the moisturizer for a week and my skin is looking and feeling phenomenal. The lack of strong scent is fantastic for all types of sensitive skin, and the packaging is beautiful!
